Compression fit keeps muscles loose and limber

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: These are incredibly thin and the pads feel thin and stiff. Cheaply made all around disappointing for the price we paid! Save your money and order a different pair.
customer_reviews.author: Just a mom and a teacher...

customer_reviews.title: Ok for a quick fix.
customer_reviews.text: I used these for 1 season and the stitching is coming out. I recommend a brand name. These were great in a pinch but did not hold up. The knee pads are also very straight and a knee is curved... Just saying that needs to be redesigned. The thigh pads fit weird too and don't lay where they should.
customer_reviews.author: Michala Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great padding!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used these as extra padding in saber dueling. I am a large girl and these were perfect for extra protection. The cup pocket also help the lo bloo. I was also able to wear my tights over them. The only problem I had was the knee pads would twist to the inside of my knee and my knee protection would slide down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very thin
customer_reviews.text: Very thin pads for the price that was paid compared to other around the same price range. Disappointed they look very cheap made thin padding definitely unsatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Right pads came with ripped stitching didn’t take less then a week till the the left leg stitching ripped and I play as offensive linemen so we take hard falls at practice from time to time and it didn’t really protect anything but my hips save your money and buy a name brand girdle.
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle Bastien

customer_reviews.title: Good Protection, but NOT Super Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Good pads, just very tight. My boys are pretty stocky kids. So they were hard to pull up. They protect well. But they didn’t find them comfortable to move around in.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. We had to have these sewed back together 3 times the first month we had them. Yes football is a rough sport but we never had this problem with any other girdles. Spend the extra money on a more well made girdle.
